Topic.Title: Does Larry Page Have Throat Cancer?

Message.Msg: A number of Great Men have had Cancer, yet somehow continued to work. The designer of England's Spitfire-Fighter-Plane, its highest performance fighter plane at start of WWII, which helped it fend off much larger numbers of German Planes in the "Battle of Britain", was dieing of Cancer yet continued to finish most of the design of this then advanced plane in 1938.
